## Welcome

I am a researcher working in bioinformatics and data analysis, focusing on the development and application of computational methods to answer biological and biomedical questions. My interests include omics data analysis, scientific reproducibility, and the development of research tools.

## Research

I primarily work with quantitative and computational approaches applied to biology, integrating experimental data with statistical methods. [See my research interests](research.qmd##sec-research-interests).

## Projects

I have participated in and led projects involving biological data analysis, the development of analytical pipelines, and the integration of multi-omic data. [Explore selected and ongoing projects](projects.qmd).

### Publications & Software Contributions

My work includes peer-reviewed scientific articles as well as methodological and computational contributions incorporated into research packages and analytical workflows. [View publications and software contributions](pubs.qmd).

## Teaching & Training

I am involved in teaching and training activities, including workshops, short courses, and educational materials focused on bioinformatics and data science. [See teaching and outreach activities](training.qmd).
